categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: A battalion of the Grand Army of the Republic was active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems and was under the command of Clone Commander CC-1993, also known as "Jet." Members of the battalion served under Jedi General Anakin Skywalker while working aboard a IPV-2C Stealth Corvette during the Battle of Christophsis. During the Second Battle of Geonosis, the battalion fell under the command of Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi.
